articles.author: CBC.ca
articles.title: Donald Trump's re-election prospects are now a Supreme Court issue
articles.description: One of the most consequential questions of the 2024 U.S. presidential election has now been turned over to the Supreme Court in a historic court filing Monday. The fundamental issue being litigated involves whether Donald Trump will be brought to trial before Americans vote in 2024.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Biden on Trump 'dictator' remark: 'He's saying it out loud'
articles.description:
President Joe Biden told donors at a political fundraiser on Monday that former President Donald Trump is a threat to U.S. democracy and said the Republican had pledged to be a dictator for a day if elected in 2024.
"I said I want to be a dictator for one day," Trump told the New York Young Republican Club annual gala.

articles.title: US seeks speedy Supreme Court review of Trump claim he is immune from prosecution
articles.description: The U.S. special counsel prosecuting Donald Trump on federal charges of trying to overturn his 2020 election defeat asked the Supreme Court on Monday to launch a fast-track review of the former president's claim he cannot be tried on those charges. Trump has appealed a decision by U.S. District Judge Tanya Chutkan on Dec. 1 rejecting his bid to dismiss the case.
